scripts.dev: npm run kill:offline && cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.dev node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/serverless offline --stage dev
scripts.dev:dev: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.dev node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/serverless offline --stage dev
scripts.deploy:prod: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.prod node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/serverless deploy --stage prod --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:dev: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.dev node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/serverless deploy --stage dev --region us-east-1
scripts.print:dev: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.dev node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/serverless print --stage dev
scripts.print:prod: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.prod node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/serverless print --stage prod
scripts.kill:offline: lsof -ti :4000 | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -ti :3002 | xargs -r kill -9; pkill -f "serverless offline" || true
scripts.db:migrate: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.dev node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/prisma migrate dev --name init_items
scripts.db:deploy: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.prod node -r dotenv/config ./node_modules/.bin/prisma migrate deploy
